description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-28899), it is essential to apply the relevant security updates as listed below:

1. Download and install the KB5040442 update applicable to your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. For systems running older versions, ensure to apply KB5040431 or KB5040427 as required.
3. After installation, restart your system to ensure that all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This security update addresses a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to bypass secure boot features.
- Updates are critical for systems with the following build numbers: 
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.3880 
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.4651 
- For manual installation, you can find the update packages at the links below:
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
  - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that you have administrative privileges to execute the update.
- Backup important data before proceeding with the update installation.
